channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Street lights out on Sapphire Road, 9th January
item.description:
Hi, I’m a business operator at the Cleevelands Centre on Sapphire Road, Bishops Cleeve (GL52 7AH) and have some concerns over the Health and Safety risk caused by several of the Street lights on Sapphire Road being out of action. The effected post are outside the Co-op and the Cleevelands Centre. It is particularly dark and I fear that this poses a risk not only for drivers, but also for pedestrians wishing to cross the road. Please can these be repaired at the earliest convenience. Kind Regards Mike Worrall Group Property & Business Development Manager Warners Retail (South West) Ltd. Eastern Avenue Gloucester GL4 3BS 07974 975324
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Both drains are blocked, 9th January
item.description:
PLEASE PLEASE clear the drains - i was walking along under the bridge this moring (9th Jan) The water was about 20cm deep in the road - the pavements are used by children walking to the nearby school. CLEAR BOTH DRAINS!!!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Station Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge road hole, 9th January
item.description:
This pothole has already caused vehicle damage. After hitting it, my car suffered a broken front suspension spring coil, resulting in significant and unavoidable repair costs. The defect presents a clear safety risk to road users and should be repaired urgently to prevent further damage or potential accidents. Please treat this as a priority, as the condition of the road surface is dangerous and has already resulted in financial loss.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayden Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Half a dozen drains blocked due to mud coming down road, 9th January
item.description:
All of the drains on the road outside Rockfield Business Park are blocked up with mud. This means rain is not draining away and is causing access issues to the industrial estate.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17-41, Old Station Drive, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road surface broken down over wide area, 9th January
item.description:

item.title: Photo taken at 3pm with only light drizzle. No significant rain in last hours and pooling water., 8th January
item.description:
Under steam train bridge in Station Road, Bishops Cleeve. Next to very narrow pathway which a main pathway for school children. Pooling water has worsened over the last few weeks. Extremely dangerous during school drop off/pick up time for children on foot as car splashes through pooling water go about 2 to 3 meters high submerging path.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Station Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
